data.title: Interfaith America with Eboo Patel and Laurie Patton – Citizen Connect
data.text:
Laurie Patton collects stories. A scholar of Indian religions and the president of Middlebury College in Middlebury, Vermont, Patton looks for narratives that show people building lasting relationships with others. “I think about what stories change people’s minds,” Patton says, particularly stories about shelter, human movement and home.

You can subscribe to the Interfaith America with Eboo Patel podcast wherever you listen to podcasts. Additionally, Interfaith America is excited to offer Podcast Engagement Awards for individuals and groups. We are asking our network to to engage in intentional reflection and conversations about Eboo Patel’s new podcast. To learn more and apply, please go to: https://www.interfaithamerica.org/grants/podcast-award/
